sentences: Garry Mills (also Gary Mills) (born 13 October 1941 in West Wickham, Kent, England) is a former British pop singer.
Mills had three hits on the UK Singles Chart in the early 1960s.

In the United States, "Look for a Star" reached No. 26 on the Billboard Hot 100."Look for a Star" also made the Hot 100 in versions by Deane Hawley, Billy Vaughn and Garry Miles, the latter a pseudonym for Buzz Cason.
